summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Chatbot Onboarding form system. Backend APIs are fully functional with 5 successful submissions stored in MongoDB. Frontend form renders correctly with validation, but has intermittent connectivity issues during submission and admin dashboard routing problems.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Frontend intermittently gets net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND when submitting forms
flaky_endpoints.impact: Users may experience failed form submissions despite backend working
flaky_endpoints.note: Backend API works perfectly when tested directly via curl, suggesting frontend-backend connectivity issue

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent AxiosError during form submission - net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
Admin dashboard at /admin shows main form instead of AdminDashboard component

passed_tests: Form renders correctly with all 5 sections and required fields
Form validation works for required fields (14 validation errors shown)
Email validation works correctly (Invalid email address error)
File upload UI works (logo and document uploads accepted)
File upload feedback shows '1 document(s) added'
Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Backend form data storage works (verified via direct API calls)
All form sections are properly structured and accessible
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin dashboard routing issue (CRITICAL) - /admin route shows main form instead of admin dashboard. Investigate frontend-backend connectivity issue causing intermittent form submission failures despite backend working correctly. Email functionality needs verification - check if emails are actually being sent with SMTP credentials.

success_percentage.backend: 90% - All API endpoints work, minor connectivity issue from frontend
success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Form works well, validation works, but admin dashboard broken and submission has connectivity issues
